name: Sigma.card_Icc
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : ι → Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq ι
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Preorder (α i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → LocallyFiniteOrder (α i)
a b : Sigma fun i => α i
⊢ Eq (Finset.Icc a b).card (dite (Eq a.fst b.fst) (fun h => (Finset.Icc (Eq.rec a.snd h) b.snd).card) fun h => 0)
decl:
theorem card_Icc : #(Icc a b) = if h : a.1 = b.1 then #(Icc (h.rec a.2) b.2) else 0 :=
  card_sigmaLift (fun _ => Icc) _ _

name: Sigma.Icc_mk_mk
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : ι → Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq ι
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Preorder (α i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → LocallyFiniteOrder (α i)
i : ι
a b : α i
⊢ Eq (Finset.Icc ⟨i, a⟩ ⟨i, b⟩) (Finset.map (Function.Embedding.sigmaMk i) (Finset.Icc a b))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem Icc_mk_mk : Icc (⟨i, a⟩ : Sigma α) ⟨i, b⟩ = (Icc a b).map (Embedding.sigmaMk i) :=
  dif_pos rfl
